name: Brain-It Up
description:
Welcome to a new world, where your brain is the place to be. Where your brain is the place to fight, where your brain is the place to survive.

We met here to provide the best shooter action in your head... So get comfy and start destroying your unmotivated thoughts that keep you away from your Work!

No worries if you feel like you play the game too much it doesn't matter. Everything you do is for you, beacause it's in your head so go a-head and 

BRAIN-IT UP!

Game made for the HRW Game Jam with Nicety 

(Game Jam duration 3 days)

Controls KEYBOARD / MOUSEMOVE[W] [A] [S] [D] JUMP[SPACE]DASH[LEFT SHIFT]SLIDE[LEFT CTRL]SHOT
[LEFT MOUSE BUTTON]GRENADE[RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON]SWINGING HOOK[Q]GRAPPLING HOOK[E]
